availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nicholas Miles Lancaster (Daviess County, KY, farmer )

body.p: Daviess County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Priscilla Lancaster. Father of Nicholas Lancaster, Ellen Lancaster, Frances Lancaster, William Lancaster, George Lancaster, and Louisa Lancaster. Farmer in Daviess County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Daviess County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Daviess County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lancaster County, District 1, p. 413A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 2, p. 842.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 2, p. 392B.
